question_sentence: Which country was controversially unveiled as the host of the men's 2034 World Cup?
evidence: The choice to award the football tournament to Saudi Arabia has raised concerns about exploitation of immigrant construction workers, as well as the safety of female and LGBTQ+ spectators. Amnesty International said the decision showed that Fifa's commitment to human rights was "a sham".

question_sentence: Which leader narrowly avoided impeachment on Saturday after members of his party boycotted the vote?
evidence: The South Korean president insisted he would not step down following his attempt to impose martial law. The opposition Democratic Party said it would reintroduce an impeachment motion every week until he is forced from office.

question_sentence: Google unveiled an ultra-powerful new quantum computer chip with what name?
evidence: Google says its quantum chip only needs five minutes to solve a problem that would take the world's fastest supercomputers 10 septillion years – more time than the universe has existed.

question_sentence: What was spotted over New Jersey, close to a military research facility and Donald Trump's golf resort?
evidence: Dozens of drones have been spotted over New Jersey in the last month, often with their lights off to avoid detection. Despite theories about foreign involvement, officials have yet to identify the source of the drones, and the FBI is actively investigating the sightings.

question_sentence: The Syrian rebel leader Ahmed al-Sharaa is better known by what nom de guerre?
evidence: Since leading Hayat Tahrir al-Sham to victory in the fight to depose Bashar al-Assad, Jawlani has begun to use his birth name in official comminiqués, part of a wider push to distance himself and the group from their Islamist roots and project a more moderate image.

question_sentence: Which former Disney Channel star took to Instagram to announce her engagement?
evidence: After a year of dating, Gomez revealed her engagement to music producer Benny Blanco through a series of Instagram photos. In one picture, she sits on a picnic blanket, admiring her ring with a Taco Bell box nearby.

question_sentence: Taylor Swift ended her mammoth Eras Tour on Sunday night with a final show in which city?
evidence: The Eras Tour began in March 2023 and has seen the megastar perform 149 shows in 51 cities around the world, raking in an estimated $2 billion, as well as giving a "Taylor bump" to local economies.

question_sentence: Which popular online game agreed a $245 million settlement with the US Federal Trade Commission?
evidence: Epic Games, the developer of "Fortnite", is issuing refunds to players who were misled into making unwanted purchases due to "unlawful billing practices". These involved "dark patterns" that tricked players into making purchases.

question_sentence: A pro-EU coalition has formed ahead of a rerun of which country's annulled presidential election?
evidence: The four-party pact unites leftists, centrists and centre-right politicians, and could see them field a single candidate against Calin Georgescu, the far-right outsider whose first-round victory stunned Europe. Last week, Romania's constitutional court ruled that the result be annulled after seeing evidence of Russian interference in the campaign.

question_sentence: Which insect has been added to the US endangered species list?
evidence: The US Fish and Wildlife Service proposed listing monarch butterflies as threatened under the Endangered Species Act. Habitat loss, insecticides and climate change disrupt their breeding and migration patterns, leading to a decline in the monarch population.

question_sentence: What has been reported flying over New Jersey and Pennsylvania?
How did the three Delaware Santa Clauses get into the 'joy business'?
choices: They were hired by a mall
They volunteered at a local charity
They were inspired by their own childhood experiences
They were recruited by a Santa training school

question_sentence: What is the Delaware Interscholastic Athletic Association (DIA  considering on Thursday?
What happened at a Milford school involving a constable's gun?
choices: It was used in a drill
It was found by a student

question_sentence: Who did Delaware Gov.-elect Matt Meyer nominate for Secretary of State?
choices: A New Castle County land use manager

question_sentence: What charges are Wilmington-area men facing as part of a gang indictment?
Is Philadelphia Eagles' Saquon Barkley on pace to break the NFL single-season rushing record?
Which Delaware dive bars were ranked among the best in the country for food?
choices: Christiana Pub and Brown's Wyoming Tavern
The Green Door Tavern and Rudy's Bar and Grill
The Old Shillelagh and Checker Bar

question_sentence: What special menu did McDonald's launch in Canada?
Why is the SS United States still in Philadelphia after eviction?
Luigi Mangione, the suspect in the killing of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, was captured in which state?
evidence: The 26-year-old suspected gunman in the UnitedHealthcare CEO shooting was arrested in Pennsylvania after a five-day manhunt that spanned multiple states.

question_sentence: A wildfire forced the evacuation of thousands from which coastal city this week?
evidence: The Franklin Fire tore through swathes of Southern California’s Malibu coastline, forcing thousands of residents to flee as flames threatened homes and businesses.

question_sentence: Which tech company encountered a widespread outage this week?
evidence: Meta scrambled to fix a major outage of its apps on Wednesday, including Instagram, Facebook and WhatsApp.

question_sentence: Which country was recently taken over by rebel forces after its former president fled to Russia?
evidence: The long rule of Syrian President Bashar al-Assad ended after rebels swept into the capital of Damascus. Many Syrians gathered this week to celebrate the fall of the Assad regime.

question_sentence: Which landmark officially reopened to the public after a five-year construction project?
evidence: Notre Dame, the treasured cathedral in Paris that went up in flames in 2019, officially reopened on Saturday. French officials held a ceremony featuring dozens of world leaders to celebrate the end of the restoration project.

question_sentence: US wildlife officials are moving to add which insect to the threatened species list?
evidence: Wildlife officials are moving to add the iconic monarch butterfly to the list of species threatened with extinction.

question_sentence: Which automaker this week announced it will end its robotaxi efforts?
evidence: General Motors is pulling the plug on its efforts to develop a fleet of driverless taxis. The company plans to focus on other driver-assistance features instead.

question_sentence: Which popular tourist city is banning the release of metallic balloons?
evidence: New Orleans, known for its celebrations and festive spirit, is now banning the release of metallic balloons following repeated disruptions to the city's electrical services.

question_sentence: What is Merriam-Webster's 2024 word of the year?
evidence: Merriam-Webster's word of the year is "polarization" — a word that has been used incessantly to describe the fraught state of American politics.

question_sentence: Which MLB team agreed to a historic deal with superstar outfielder Juan Soto?
evidence: Juan Soto signed a record-shattering $765 million deal with the New York Mets. The contract is not only the biggest in MLB history but in all professional sports.
